newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA 136-7 V INDIA - TEA.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA 136-7 V INDIA - TEA.

text.p: South Africa, needing 356 to win, were 136-7 at the resheduled tea interval on the rain-hit fifth and last day of the third and final test against India on Monday.
Scores: India 410-9 and 266-8 declared, South Africa 321 and 136-7.
